attributes.action: make privately owner horseboxes exempt from the proposed London Emission Zone legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of horseboxes are privately owned and used infrequently (less than once a week) and there are numerous examples where it is impossible or cost prohibitive to make the neccessary engine/exhaust modifications and therefore will have to be scrapped creating a different environmental issue.
